item.title: VM host upgrade
item.description: This is a report I was tasked to write for work, to spec new parts and potential new builds for the upgrade of an all-SSD VM host VM Host Upgrade/Build Report Current Specs Type Model Server Dell PowerEdge R830 Compute Intel Xeon E5-4628L v4 (x4) Memory Samsung M393A4K40CB1-CRC 2Rx4 ECC RDIMM DDR4 2400 32GB (x6) Storage PERC H330 integrated controller Samsung SSD 850 EVO 1TB (x1) VM Capability CPU Assigning 2 threads to each VM, consider each of the 4 CPUs has 28 threads This server supports Intel Xeon E5-4600 v4 family processors.
